aWLI_StateProvision.content: {\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1036\deflangfe2052{\fonttbl{\f0\fswiss\fprq2\fcharset0 Microsoft Sans Serif;}{\f1\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f2\fswiss\fcharset0 Arial;}} {\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;} {\info{\horzdoc}{\*\lchars ([\'7b\'a1\'a4\'a1\'ae\'a1\'b0\'a1\'b4\'a1\'b6\'a1\'b8\'a1\'ba\'a1\'be\'a1\'b2\'a1\'bc\'a3\'a8\'a3\'ae\'a3\'db\'a3\'fb\'a1\'ea\'a3\'a4}{\*\fchars !),.:\'3b?]\'7d\'a1\'a7\'a1\'a4\'a1\'a6\'a1\'a5\'a8\'44\'a1\'ac\'a1\'af\'a1\'b1\'a 1\'ad\'a1\'c3\'a1\'a2\'a1\'a3\'a1\'a8\'a1\'a9\'a1\'b5\'a1\'b7\'a1\'b9\'a1\'bb\'a1\'bf\'a1\'b3\'a1\'bd\'a3\'a1\'a3\'a2\'a3\'a7\'a3\'a9\'a3\'ac\'a3\'ae\'a3\'ba\'a3\'bb\'a3\'bf\'a3\'dd\'a3\'e0\'a3\'fc\'a3\'fd\'a1\'ab\'a1\'e9}} \viewkind4\uc1\pard\li15\qj\cf1\lang1033\expndtw2\f0\fs16 Until benefits have been paid for 5 years in the same claim, total disability means that, because of sickness or injury, you are not able to perform the material and substantial duties of your occu pation.\cf0\expndtw0\kerning2 \par \cf1\expndtw2\kerning0 \par After that, in the same claim, total disability means that, because of sickness or injury, you are not able to perform the material and substantial duties of you occupation and you are not at work in any occupation.\cf0\expndtw0\kerning2 \par \cf1\expndtw2\kerning0 \par Your occupation means the regular occupation (or occupations, if more than one) in which you are engaged at the time you become disabled.\cf0\expndtw0\kerning2 \par \cf1\expndtw2\kerning0 \par If your occupation is limited to a single medi cal specialty certified by the American Board of Medical Specialties or a single dental specialty recognized by the American Dental Association, we will deem your specialty to be your occupation. \cf 0 ndtw0\kerning2 \par \cf1\kerning0 \par This policy will pay a benefit of $1,000 when you are totally disabled.\cf0\expndtw0\kerning2\f1\fs20 \par \pard\lang1036\kerning0\f2 \par }
aWLI_StateProvision.Title: Total Disability
aWLI_StateProvision.Name: Total Disability
